page.title: 15Junior School Log.
page.content: From the log book of Surfleet Sea's End School on Friday 19th July 1985:- "Nurse Whiteley took her leave of us today. Mrs. White will be our 'eads 'n' 'ands lady next term. P.C. Priestly spoke to the children today about holiday safety - in the street, in the home or by the water. Assembly was at the end of the day and we said our goodbyes to 12 children, 1 to Spalding Grammar, 1 to Spalding High, 2 to Priory School and 8 to Spalding Gleed Schools. Samantha Minshull won the girls'Cup for best performance. The boys' cup was not won. The leavers presented prizes to the staff before they departed. Next term's roll is expected to be thirty-six children." Patrick Hall.
